name: Utgarda, Generaider Boss of Delusion
desc: You can only control 1 "Utgarda, Generaider Boss of Delusion". (Quick Effect): You can Tribute 2 "Generaider" monsters and/or Rock monsters, then target 1 card on the field; banish it. You can only use this effect of "Utgarda, Generaider Boss of Delusion" once per turn.
